messages.content: What is the return policy for items purchased at our store?

You can return most items within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange. Items must be in their original condition, with all tags and packaging intact. Please bring your receipt or proof of purchase when returning items.
Are there any items that cannot be returned under this policy?
Yes, certain items such as clearance merchandise, perishable goods, and personal care items are non-returnable. Please check the product description or ask a store associate for more details.
How will I receive my refund?
Refunds will be issued to the original form of payment. If you paid by credit card, the refund will be credited to your card. If you paid by cash or check, you will receive a cash refund.
Can I return an item without a receipt?

Returns can only be made with proof of purchase. If you have any legitimate proof of purchase you'll be able to return the item. Otherwise the store cannot accept the item for returning as per return policy.
How long does it take to process a return?
Returns are typically processed within 5-7 business days. Once processed, refunds to credit cards may take an additional 3-5 business days to appear on your statement.
Can I return online purchases in-store?

Yes, online purchases can be returned in-store. Please bring the packing slip or order confirmation email along with the items you wish to return. All returns must be made according to the return policy
Can I return the item if it's been 2 months already?
Unfortunately, the answer is no. According to our return policy, items can only be returned within 30 days.
Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?

Yes, you can exchange an item for a different size, color, or a similar item. Exchanges can be made in-store or by contacting our customer service for online purchases. All exchanges have to be made according to the store's return policy.
What if I received a damaged or defective item?

If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact our customer service immediately. We will arrange for a replacement or refund and provide instructions for returning the damaged item. Please note that the return must be made according to the return policy.
Can I return items bought with a gift card?

Yes, items purchased with a gift card can be returned according to the return policy. Please note the some items can not be returned. You will receive the refund as if you bought an item without gift card.
Is there a restocking fee for returns?
No, we do not charge a restocking fee for returns. You will receive a full refund for the returned item as long as it meets the return policy criteria.
What should I do if I lost my receipt?

If you have lost your receipt, we may be able to look up your purchase using your credit card information or other proof of purchase, such as an order confirmation email. Please contact our customer service for assistance.
Can I return an item purchased during a sale?
Yes, items purchased during a sale can be returned according to the return policy. Please ensure that the item is in its original condition and you have the receipt or proof of purchase.
What is the return policy for international orders?

International orders can be returned within 30 days of purchase. Please note that return shipping costs for international orders are the responsibility of the customer, and we recommend using a trackable shipping service.
Can I return items bought using store credit?
Yes, items purchased using store credit can be returned according to the return policy. The refund will be issued as store credit.
How do I return a gift?

To return a gift, please bring the item and the gift receipt or proof of purchase to the store. If you do not have a gift receipt, the item can only be returned by the original purchaser. Also, the gift must be returned within 30 days.
What if I miss the return deadline?
If you miss the return deadline, we unfortunately cannot process a return. We recommend contacting our customer service for further assistance or to see if any exceptions can be made.
Can I return seasonal items after the season is over?
Seasonal items can be returned within 30 days of purchase, regardless of the season. Please ensure the item is in its original condition and you have the receipt or proof of purchase.
